oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Rain-making: told to //kabbo by a Rain-maker who was his foster-father. (L II.-25. 2264-2319 1/2.) About the rainmaker, parts of the rain, the rain and seasons and clouds and the wind. Also describes the doings of springbok and people, and different types of rain and water. The verso pages contain additional information about things relating to the rain and rainmaking.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Rainmaking: another story of it
